fr.umlv.zen3

Class KeyboardEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.zen3.KeyboardEvent

  • public class KeyboardEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    A keyboard key and its set of modifiers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyboardKey getKey()
      Returns the keyboard key.
      java.util.Set<KeyboardKey.Modifier> getModifiers()
      A set of the modifier keys that can contain KeyboardKey.Modifier.META, KeyboardKey.Modifier.CTRL, KeyboardKey.Modifier.ALT, KeyboardKey.Modifier.SHIFT and/or KeyboardKey.Modifier.ALT_GR.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        public KeyboardKey getKey()
        Returns the keyboard key.
        Returns:
        the keyboard key or KeyboardKey.UNDEFINED if the key is not recognized.

      • getModifiers

        public java.util.Set<KeyboardKey.Modifier> getModifiers()
        A set of the modifier keys that can contain KeyboardKey.Modifier.META, KeyboardKey.Modifier.CTRL, KeyboardKey.Modifier.ALT, KeyboardKey.Modifier.SHIFT and/or KeyboardKey.Modifier.ALT_GR.
        Returns:
        a set of modifier keys or an empty set if no modifier keys are used.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
